Class Binary.BinaryFile

java.lang.Object
org.rapidcontext.core.data.Binary.BinaryFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Binary
Enclosing interface:

public static class Binary.BinaryFile extends Object implements Binary
A binary data object, encapsulating a file.
Version:
1.0

      public String mimeType()

      Specified by:

      Returns:

    • openStream

      public InputStream openStream() throws IOException
      Opens a new input stream for reading the data. Note that this method SHOULD be possible to call several times.
      Specified by:
      openStream in interface Binary
      Returns:
      a new input stream for reading the binary data
      Throws:
